AxTableField.Name: AppointmentCancellationDeadlineLimit
AxTableField.HelpText: The deadline limit for cancelling appointment before which no cancellation fees is charged
AxTableField.Label: Cancellation deadline limit (in hours)

AxTableField.HelpText: Days before reminder email is set to patient
AxTableField.Label: Days before reminder email

AxTableField.HelpText: Default item group to be assigned to service
